name: Barbarossa Remake
storyline: In the tower of Barbarossa, a formidable mage renowned for his mystical prowess, a legion of monstrous creatures lies in wait on each ascending level. Guided by ancient spells and wielding arcane powers, Barbarossa must conquer the tower's escalating trials, facing ever-more formidable enemies and diabolical challenges. Can Barbarossa harness his magic to surpass each floor's increasing difficulty and emerge as the true master of the tower?
summary: A Fantasy Top Down level based game that features around a little mage that has special abilities
